parse: Conjunction
str2: And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To send, transmit, permit to go, put forth.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Preposition
str2: A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.

parse: Noun - Accusative Feminine Singular
str2: Bethlehem, a town of Judea. Of Hebrew origin; Bethleem, a place in Palestine.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To travel, journey, go, die.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To examine, question, inquire at, search out. From ek and etazo; to test thoroughly, i.e. Ascertain or interrogate.

parse: Adverb
str2: Carefully, exactly, strictly, distinctly. Adverb from the same as akribestatos; exactly.

parse: Preposition
str2: From the base of peran; properly, through, i.e. Around; figuratively with respect to; used in various applications, of place, cause or time.

parse: Article - Genitive Neuter Singular
str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Noun - Genitive Neuter Singular
str2: Neuter diminutive of pais; a childling, i.e., an infant, or a half-grown boy or girl; figuratively, an immature Christian.

parse: Conjunction
str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Conjunction
str2: After, when, as soon as. From epi and an; a particle of indefinite contemporaneousness; whenever, as soon as.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: A prolonged form of a primary heuro, which heureo is used for it in all the tenses except the present and imperfect to find.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To report (from one place to another), bring a report, announce, declare. From apo and the base of aggelos; to announce.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Conjunction
str2: From hos and pos; what(-ever) how, i.e. In the manner that (as adverb or conjunction of coincidence, intentional or actual).

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 1st Person Singular
str2: To also, I too, but I. From kai and ego; so also the dative case kamoi, and accusative case kame and I, me.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To come, go.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: From pros and a probable derivative of kuon; to fawn or crouch to, i.e. prostrate oneself in homage.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
